query: SELECT * FROM prayers WHERE date = '2025-12-25' AND language = 'en';
command: mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway02.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3iGTxswc6mEvKqK.123d5e15984b --database TPrCbEq5NBpZD38FSbAtHZ --execute SELECT * FROM prayers WHERE date = '2025-12-25' AND language = 'en';
messages: 30001	en	2025-12-25	NULL	Celebrating the Birth of Hope	Christmas Day	Dear God,

Today, we gather to celebrate the birth of your son, Jesus. We remember the joy and hope that this day brings to the world. May we find peace and love in our hearts, just as the shepherds and wise men did on that first Christmas. Help us to share this joy with others, to be a beacon of light in the darkness.

We are grateful for the gift of life, for the love that surrounds us, and for the hope that fills our hearts. May we carry this hope with us throughout the year, knowing that your love is always with us.
On this special day, we ask for your blessings upon all who celebrate. May your peace be with us, and may your love guide us.

Amen.	I am filled with hope and joy this Christmas day.	Share a kind act with someone today, spreading the joy of Christmas.	May the peace of Christ be with you today.	May the blessings of Christmas fill your heart with joy and your home with love.	2025-12-25 01:54:35
